summary: A poet sells his collection of comic books and action figures in order to afford to hire a male stripper on New Years Eve.
cast: Aeious Asin|Aries Pena|Belinda|Madeleine Nicolas|Nonie Buencamino|Danton Remoto|Gelo Pascual|Dana Uy|Carmenchu Caballero|Sobey Wing|Wild|Lady Alliyah|Lady Abbie|Lady Marimar|Lawrence|Stanley|Marky|Brian|Ace
title: Boy
